Name: Idle Poker
About the game: A collaboration between Poker and idle game!! How is your luck? [Features] - Action buttons to select what to do - Involve poker in ascension - Automated Poker - Of course, there are also modes with card changes - Fever mode!!(Increased probability of hand) - High & Low challenge [] Click buttons to select action BGM : 魔王魂
